data.name: Lock's Quest Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy the official soundtrack of Lock's Quest:

01. Enter the Clockwork Boss
02. Enter the King
03. Farewell Antonia
04. Farewell Archineers
05. Farewell Nomads
06. Game Over
07. Heathern's Theme
08. Kingdom Force

10. Learning to Build
11. Lock & Emi
12. Lock's in Trouble

14. Lord of the Clockworks
15. Majestic
16. Realizations

18. Resist
19. The Archineers
20. The Battle of Dark Ridge
21. The City of Antonia

25. The Final Battle with Agony
26. The Final Battle
27. The Final Journey (Credits)
28. The First Battle
29. The Fourth Battle
30. The Great World
31. The Mysterious BlueBit

34. The Seers
35. The Seventh Battle
36. The Sixth Battle
37. The Story Begins
38. The Third Battle
39. The True Sacrifice
40. The War Machine
41. To Battle
42. Victorious Kingdom Force
43. Wartorn

data.short_description: Enjoy the official soundtrack of Lock's Quest!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.7 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.4
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 2.7 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
